data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de la Ceramica.
David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Medie Jimenez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
In the minute 5, David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Bilbao.
In the minute 9, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
At Estadio de la Ceramica, Villarreal are penalized for being offside.
Fer Nino (Villarreal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Pau Torres's header is off-target for Villarreal.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 11, Bilbao needs to be cautious. Villarreal have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the home team in Villarreal.
Bilbao's Inaki Williams breaks free at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Villarreal.
In the minute 19, Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Inaki Williams gives Bilbao a 0-1 lead.
Yuri Berchiche with an assist there.
In the minute 22, Attention is being given to Villarreal’s Mario Gaspar and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Bilbao's Unai Vencedor misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 23, Villarreal have a goal kick.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Unai Emery is making the team's first substitution at Estadio de la Ceramica with Ruben Pena replacing Mario Gaspar.
In the minute 25, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Bilbao's area.
Gerard Moreno for Villarreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 30, Free kick in a good position for Bilbao!
Villarreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
In the minute 33, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 36, Gerard Moreno (Villarreal) has received a yellow card from David Medie Jimenez.
David Medie Jimenez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 38, Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bilbao drive upfield and Alex Berenguer gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Alex Berenguer (Bilbao) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal's Gerard Moreno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 43, Villarreal's Ruben Pena gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Mikel Vesga (Bilbao) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Manu Trigueros gets his shot on target but fails to score for Villarreal.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Villarreal.
The second-half is underway at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Bilbao's half.
In Villarreal Villarreal attack through Raul Albiol. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Villarreal Villarreal drive forward through Fer Nino. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 51, Villarreal's Gerard Moreno gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de la Ceramica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bilbao drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Villarreal to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 55, Alfonso Pedraza of Villarreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
David Medie Jimenez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Fer Nino (Villarreal) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 56, Bilbao have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Goal kick for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 58, Bilbao make their first substitution with Dani Garcia replacing Mikel Vesga.
In the minute 59, Villarreal's Gerard Moreno is on target but unsuccessful.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Free kick Villarreal.
In the minute 62, Villarreal to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Bilbao's Alex Berenguer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Throw-in for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Villarreal at Estadio de la Ceramica.
In the minute 66, In Villarreal Villarreal attack through Moi Gomez. The finish is off target, however.
David Medie Jimenez awards Bilbao a goal kick.
Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a second substitution, with Yeremi Pino replacing Juan Foyth.
In the minute 67, David Medie Jimenez signals a Villarreal throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Bilbao.
Villarreal push upfield but David Medie Jimenez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 68, Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Bilbao are whistled for offside.
In the minute 70, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Villarreal have a goal kick.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Villarreal surge into the attack at Estadio de la Ceramica but Ruben Pena’s header is off-target.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Villarreal.
Alex Berenguer (Bilbao) has received a first yellow card.
In Villarreal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Villarreal have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Villarreal drive into the zone and Yeremi Pino is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 74, Villarreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Yeremi Pino is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 74, Great play from Manu Trigueros to set up the goal.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Villarreal.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio de la Ceramica.
The away team replace Inaki Williams with Raul Garcia.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Villarreal.
Oihan Sancet is replacing Iker Muniain for the away team.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 81, Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
Pervis Estupinan is on a sub for Alfonso Pedraza for Villarreal.
Villarreal make their fourth substitution with Samuel Chukwueze replacing Fer Nino.
In the minute 84, Bilbao have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Inigo Lekue is on a sub for Alex Berenguer for Bilbao.
Jon Morcillo is replacing Oscar De Marcos for the away team.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
David Medie Jimenez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Oihan Sancet for Bilbao gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
David Medie Jimenez awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Villarreal.
Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
At Estadio de la Ceramica the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jon Morcillo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bilbao.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Villarreal.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
